topics.body:
!http://36.media.tumblr.com/26a5ee43819eb2a0046e6be7b1f16eb2/tumblr_nbcnaflLVm1s6lwy2o1_1280.jpg!
This is a "Shadhavar":http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shadhavar. A type of unicorn from Persian folklore that lures children in with music produce by wind blowing into their horn, and *eats them*.

!http://images.china.cn/attachement/jpg/site1007/20131126/001ec949c22b13fe9f3a28.JPG!
This is a "Xièzhì":http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Xiezhi. They are essentially unicorns in East Asian folklore that can tell an innocent person apart from a guilty one, by *impaling and gutting* the guilty.
